document_data.mainbody:
Tagar Lusos was an aquatic elf dukar of the Order of Numos and a member of the Nantarn Council.
Despite his irrational hatred of Morgan Ildacer, Tagar was an effective councilor and normally spoke in defense of the people of eastern Ser√¥s (locathah, shalarin, and Qatoris morkoth included).
